scripts.deploy: npm run build:lambda && cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.sam:invoke: npm run local:setup && SAM_CLI_TELEMETRY=0 sam local invoke CreatePersonFunction --template sam/template.yaml -e sam/event.json
scripts.local:setup: docker-compose up -d && sleep 10 && aws dynamodb create-table --table-name PersonTable --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
scripts.local:dev: npm run local:setup && npm run build:lambda && SAM_CLI_TELEMETRY=0 AWS_SAM_LOCAL=true sam local start-api --template sam/template.yaml --warm-containers EAGER
